items.sentence: Tom checked out a few books from the school library a few days ago.
I thought after your meeting with Tom, we could have a little talk.
When I didn\'t know how to answer the question, Tom gave me a hint.
When Tom got home, the children had already finished eating dinner.
When the military pulled out, many injured people were left behind.
Tom fell in love with Mary and they got married three months later.
Tom sent his last text message just three minutes before the crash.
Tom never leaves his house without being accompanied by bodyguards.
The guy had a suitcase covered in stickers from all over the world.
Tom drove all the way across town just to buy Mary a birthday cake.
